Notes

Matrix / Runout: 17-476583-10 A2 Sony Music

Rights Society: BIEM/STEMRA

Label Code: LC 0162

Price Code: CB 811

Other (Manufacturing Code): 17.476583.10

Other (Format Code): CDC

Wild Romance is:

Herman Brood - Vocals, Keyboards.

David Hollestelle - Guitars - Peavey Amps.

Gus Genser - Drums, Vocals - Sonor Drums and Paiste Cymbals.

Ivo Severijns - Bass, Vocals - custom made Gebuys basses and Eden Cabinets.

Recorded at Studio Friends, Amsterdam and at Arnold Mürhen Studios, Volendam.

Mixed at Bullet Sound Studio, Nederhorst den Berg.

All songs published by Coach Music.

Special thanks to:

Boris Vanderlek (sax on "Clear"), Jeroen van Kooten, Big Al Lagarde, Terry Bardoul (Stage Gear), Rian Kolster (Papen and Bongaerts), Tam Lalupa (taking care of bizniz), Aart Verkerk (Sans), Charles Kuiper (Artensia), Ellis, Ernie, Willem.

Wild Romance crew: Marcel, Kees, Sander, Juan, Eddy, Bé, Cathelijne, Riana.

℗ 1994 Sony Music Entertainment (Holland) B.V.

© 1994 Sony Music Entertainment (Holland) B.V.

"Columbia" is the exclusive trademark of Sony Music Entertainment Inc.

Distribution Sony Music.

Made in Austria.
